LABEL: 0x132
STRING: I walk down a familiar street after finishing up at work.

LABEL: 0x17A
STRING: I get on the train and go two stops away from my workplace.

LABEL: 0x1C0
STRING: I then get off and walk about for around 15 minutes.

LABEL: 0x206
STRING: I then see my favorite bar, the Planet's Moon.

LABEL: 0x2CF
STRING: It's about 8:00pm.

LABEL: 0x303
STRING: ...Okay, it's the usual time.

LABEL: 0x347
STRING: I enter the bar and sit at my usual seat near the counter.

LABEL: 0x391
STRING: This is my favorite seat. No one else is going to get it today.

LABEL: 0x3EB
STRING: I can tell this is going to be a good day. I made good time.

LABEL: 0x439
STRING: This bar doesn't have many customers. It's a bit out of the way.

LABEL: 0x48B
STRING: It's great for someone like me, who wants to be left alone. While I'm here, I can enjoy my night in peace.

LABEL: 0x4F1
STRING: The bar has a pretty modern aesthetic, and it plays jazz music I like.

LABEL: 0x569
STRING: It has become routine for me to visit the Planet's Moon when I'm done with work.

LABEL: 0x5DD
STRING: Officially, I'd say I'm here because drinking alone is the best.

LABEL: 0x62F
STRING: But... I had another reason.

LABEL: 0x671
STRING: ...I'm in love.

LABEL: 0x6AD
STRING: After a while, a woman enters the bar.

LABEL: 0x754
STRING: Clear blue eyes deeper than the sea...

LABEL: 0x79C
STRING: A perfect proportion that charms every man she passes by.

LABEL: 0x7F6
STRING: Her figure, with her long, beautiful golden hair swaying.

LABEL: 0x83E
STRING: She is an actress: Ayume Daffodil.

LABEL: 0x880
STRING: She's not very famous, but I've seen her on TV sometimes.

LABEL: 0x8E0
STRING: Is this love at first sight? It feels like a longing, like a tower I cannot climb...

LABEL: 0x956
STRING: When I first saw her here, my heart was completely taken.

LABEL: 0x9C8
STRING: She is always on my mind when I got home, and when I go to work in the morning.

LABEL: 0xA36
STRING: Maybe this is what love feels like...

LABEL: 0xAA4
STRING: I'm ashamed to admit that I might just be going to this bar to see her.

LABEL: 0xB16
STRING: Well, that's just how things are. I can't even work up the courage to talk to her.

LABEL: 0xB7E
STRING: And while I was thinking that...

LABEL: 0xC45
STRING: Ayume Daffodil was standing right in front of me.

LABEL: 0xCD4
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0xCE4
STRING: Hey there, do mind if I... sit next to you?

LABEL: 0xD39
STRING: Wha... whoa...!

LABEL: 0xD79
STRING: I was so startled that I spilled my drink.

LABEL: 0xDD9
STRING: What should I do? She went through the trouble of talking to me, but now...

LABEL: 0xE3A
STRING: Oh, she's going to think I'm clumsy...

LABEL: 0xEFE
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0xF0E
STRING: Oh my, are you alright? Hold on, I'll go get you a wipe...

LABEL: 0xFAB
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0xFBB
STRING: Here you go. You can use this if you'd like. You can throw it away when you're done.

LABEL: 0x1029
STRING: She held out a plain white handkerchief.

LABEL: 0x1077
STRING: Throw it away... No, I can't accept something like this in the first place!

LABEL: 0x112E
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x113E
STRING: Well? If you don't hurry, it's going to stain your clothes. Are you sure?

LABEL: 0x11A2
STRING: Ayume Daffodil... looked at me with concern.

LABEL: 0x11F8
STRING: I had no choice but to accept.

LABEL: 0x1256
STRING: I felt bad about it, but I decided to take the handkerchief and use it.

LABEL: 0x12BC
STRING: Ugh, what to do... I need to wash it clean and then return it.

LABEL: 0x130D
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x131D
STRING: I'm sorry for speaking to you so suddenly. You must have been startled.

LABEL: 0x13C6
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x13D6
STRING: The only single seats are over here at the counter. The rest are booths, and I don't want a group coming in to bother me.

LABEL: 0x1461
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1471
STRING: So, I thought I'd sit next to you... Is that okay?

LABEL: 0x156E
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x157E
STRING: Thanks. Well then, I'll take your word for it... Hah.

LABEL: 0x1617
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1627
STRING: As an apology, I'll buy you a drink today. Order whatever you like.

LABEL: 0x16B6
STRING: What to do... I'm the one who should be sorry.

LABEL: 0x1710
STRING: I was so nervous I started to sweat.

LABEL: 0x175E
STRING: I can't figure Ayume out...

LABEL: 0x17F7
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1807
STRING: Bartender, how about the usual?

LABEL: 0x18C9
STRING: Bartender

LABEL: 0x18DB
STRING: Of course. Please wait a moment.

LABEL: 0x192B
STRING: After taking Ayume's order, the bartender begins preparing the cocktail.

LABEL: 0x198B
STRING: After a little while, her favorite cocktail is served - a Gimlet.

LABEL: 0x1A2A
STRING: Bartender

LABEL: 0x1A3C
STRING: Here's your Gimlet.

LABEL: 0x1AA8
STRING: After sipping it, Ayume smiles a little.

LABEL: 0x1AFE
STRING: This is something I usually saw from afar.

LABEL: 0x1B4E
STRING: I never thought I would see this up close.

LABEL: 0x1BFC
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1C0C
STRING: What about you? What do you want? Or... maybe you're being shy?

LABEL: 0x1CB5
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1CC5
STRING: It's fine, don't worry about it! Order what you always do, it will be also easier for me.

LABEL: 0x1E33
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1E43
STRING: Hey, you're too young to drink, aren't you? Don't be so reckless.

LABEL: 0x1E9C
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1EAC
STRING: You can't hide it, can you? I can tell - you look so young.

LABEL: 0x1F55
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1F65
STRING: Hmm... I'm right, aren't I? Don't worry. I won't call for the police.

LABEL: 0x1FD2
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1FE2
STRING: I dirtied your clothes today, so... we'll call it even. Okay? Secret just between you and me.

LABEL: 0x20B1
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x20C1
STRING: Well, how about some... orange juice, shall we? Oolong tea wouldn't fit the atmosphere...

LABEL: 0x2186
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x2196
STRING: Hehe! I'm not making fun of you. Don't get defensive, okay? I was just trying to be considerate.

LABEL: 0x2255
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x2265
STRING: Oh, that's right. I forgot to ask; what's your name?

LABEL: 0x2314
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x2324
STRING: Ah, so your name is Itarou. I'm... Ayume.

LABEL: 0x23C1
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x23D1
STRING: Have you heard of me? I'm Ayume Daffodil, an actress. I hear I'm a bit obscure.

LABEL: 0x243E
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x244E
STRING: I'm not very famous, so not many people know about me. It's hilarious, isn't it?

LABEL: 0x2555
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x2565
STRING: Really? I'm so glad! I never thought I'd meet a fan here!!

LABEL: 0x260E
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x261E
STRING: I'm so lucky. What an amazing coincidence!

LABEL: 0x26BF
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x26CF
STRING: Eh, oh well. I guess that just means I need to work harder.

LABEL: 0x2780
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x2790
STRING: I've been meaning to ask you. I always see you here.

LABEL: 0x2848
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x2858
STRING: Do you like it here, by any chance?

LIST.STRING: Actually, I was hoping to see you...

LABEL: 0x2933
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x2943
STRING: Really? I like this place too. The aesthetic and music is very relaxing...

LABEL: 0x2A04
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x2A14
STRING: We seem to get along pretty well! I want to get to know you better.

LABEL: 0x2AD9
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x2AE9
STRING: Haha! Stop all the flattery. Seriously... teasing me won't get you anywhere.

LABEL: 0x2B61
STRING: I've had a crush on her for so long, and I never thought... I'd have the chance to talk to her.

LABEL: 0x2BD1
STRING: I was so thrilled, I could barely think of what to say next. My mind was a complete blank.

LABEL: 0x2C35
STRING: The time passed so quickly.

LABEL: 0x2CDA
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x2CEA
STRING: Oh, no, is it that late already? Well, I'd better be off.

LABEL: 0x2D9D
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x2DAD
STRING: Hehe... Let's meet again, lovely boy.

LABEL: 0x2E2E
STRING: Ayume waves at me and leaves.

LABEL: 0x2E78
STRING: I watched her beautiful backside until she was no longer in sight.

LABEL: 0x302F
STRING: I did my job, as usual.

LABEL: 0x306F
STRING: Then, I drank some sake while watching Ayume Daffodil at the bar.

LABEL: 0x30CF
STRING: But today was unusual.

LABEL: 0x311D
STRING: It didn't matter I spilled my drink.

LABEL: 0x317B
STRING: And it didn't matter that I never thought I'd talk to her.

LABEL: 0x31E9
STRING: Just the fact I met the woman of my dreams caused my heart to soar.

LABEL: 0x3255
STRING: My heart is pounding, even now.

LABEL: 0x329D
STRING: I can barely contain my excitement, much like the day I saw her for the first time.

LABEL: 0x32F7
STRING: As I wash Ayume's handkerchief, all I can think about is her.

LABEL: 0x3359
STRING: Oh, that's right. I still need to return this!

LABEL: 0x33A9
STRING: Good. I'll have a reason to see Ayume again... or rather, a reason to talk.

LABEL: 0x3413
STRING: I enter a euphoric state, charmed by the possibility of meeting her again.

LABEL: 0x346F
STRING: Oh, no no no! Ayume will laugh at me if she sees me like this...

LABEL: 0x34D9
STRING: I try to fend off my thoughts about Ayume, and snuggle under the covers of my bed.

LABEL: 0x353B
STRING: Ayume Daffodil... Ms. Ayume.

LABEL: 0x3587
STRING: A very beautiful person, and I'm not just talking about her hair...

LABEL: 0x35E7
STRING: It's like she has an aura... A charm that really captivates people.

LABEL: 0x3653
STRING: It's not just her looks. Her voice, too, definitely attracts people.

LABEL: 0x36BF
STRING: And I was so close to her.

LABEL: 0x36F9
STRING: That beautiful blonde was so close to me.

LABEL: 0x3745
STRING: What was once so far away, I could reach with my hand.

LABEL: 0x37B7
STRING: She had the sweet smell of flowers.

LABEL: 0x3805
STRING: When I was talking to Ayume, I got so excited...

LABEL: 0x386B
STRING: It was like I was dreaming. I could barely remember what I was saying.

LABEL: 0x38CF
STRING: Of course, I don't even remember the taste of the drink at all.

LABEL: 0x3927
STRING: I'm in love. Or at least, I'm falling in love all over again. I've loved you since the beginning.

LABEL: 0x397D
STRING: It's like I've been going to Planet's Moon just for her, no matter what.

LABEL: 0x39EB
STRING: It would be a disaster if she found out how excited I truly am about her.

LABEL: 0x3A47
STRING: I'm sure she would laugh and say something like 'Men are so dumb'.

LABEL: 0x3AA7
STRING: I fell asleep, already in a dreamlike state.

LABEL: 0x3AF3
STRING: Ayume... I wonder if I'll see you again.

LABEL: 0x3CF7
STRING: I can't catch up with you.

LABEL: 0x3D35
STRING: I will never be special.

LABEL: 0x3D71
STRING: No matter how much effort I put in, I will never make it in time.

LABEL: 0x3DC3
STRING: You will move on without me.

LABEL: 0x3E07
STRING: Even if I ran after you with all my might, I would never catch up.

LABEL: 0x3E6D
STRING: It is far too late for that.

LABEL: 0x3EA5
STRING: It's just far too late...

LABEL: 0x3EE1
STRING: Answer this - I want an answer.

LABEL: 0x3F27
STRING: 'Do I deserve to be next to you?'

LABEL: 0x3F73
STRING: All my hard work paid off. I have become someone special.

LABEL: 0x3FE5
STRING: I look at all the voices praising me in the theater...

LABEL: 0x403B
STRING: People who think I'm special. People who like me. People who support me.

LABEL: 0x409B
STRING: People who look only at me...

LABEL: 0x40E3
STRING: Even with all these people... it's still not enough.

LABEL: 0x4141
STRING: When will I be special to you?

LABEL: 0x4197
STRING: I felt tears streaming down my cheeks.

LABEL: 0x41DF
STRING: How I wish I could smile as I did when I first met you.

LABEL: 0x43C2
STRING: I walk down a familiar street after finishing up at work.

LABEL: 0x440A
STRING: I get on the train and go two stops away from my workplace. I then get off and walk about for around 15 minutes.

LABEL: 0x4472
STRING: I then see my favorite bar, the Planet's Moon.

LABEL: 0x453B
STRING: It's about 8:00pm.

LABEL: 0x456F
STRING: ...Okay, it's the usual time. I enter the bar and sit at my usual seat near the counter.

LABEL: 0x45D5
STRING: This is my favorite seat. No one else is going to get it today.

LABEL: 0x462F
STRING: I'm glad I made it on time.

LABEL: 0x46C4
STRING: A short time later, a woman enters the bar.

LABEL: 0x471A
STRING: Yes. I was waiting for you.

LABEL: 0x47D0
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x47E0
STRING: Oh, it's you. Nice to see you again! Good evening.

LABEL: 0x482B
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x483B
STRING: I'm sorry about yesterday. Forcing you to talk with me... It was annoying, wasn't it?

LABEL: 0x48EE
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x48FE
STRING: Oh! The handkerchief... You washed it? It was really dirty, you could have thrown it out.

LABEL: 0x4980
STRING: She smiles as she takes the washed and cleaned handkerchief.

LABEL: 0x4A2B
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x4A3B
STRING: But thank you. You really are a wonderful person. I think I might fall in love with you, boy.

LIST.STRING: Oh, it's no trouble at all!
Would you like to join me today?

LABEL: 0x4B52
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x4B62
STRING: Oh, dear. It's okay, you don't need to be so modest! You should have more confidence in yourself.

LABEL: 0x4C1B
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x4C2B
STRING: Hmm... Cute. Shall we have a drink together today, too? I wanted to talk to you some more.

LABEL: 0x4CFA
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x4D0A
STRING: Really? Yes, please. I'd be happy to... I'm honored.

LABEL: 0x4DBF
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x4DCF
STRING: By the way, are you always alone? Actually, don't worry about it. I usually drink alone, myself.

LABEL: 0x4E3E
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x4E4E
STRING: Drinking alone is very relaxing, isn't it? It's not so bad to have a drink with someone sometimes.

LABEL: 0x4F07
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x4F17
STRING: Bartender, I'll take the usual, please.

LABEL: 0x4FDC
STRING: After taking Ayume's order, the bartender prepares a cocktail.

LABEL: 0x503C
STRING: After a while, her Gimlet is ready.

LABEL: 0x508B
STRING: Bartender

LABEL: 0x509D
STRING: Please.

LABEL: 0x50DF
STRING: With her usual motion, Ayume sips the cocktail.

LABEL: 0x5139
STRING: It feels like a miracle to see this scene up close.

LABEL: 0x5199
STRING: I wish I could watch it all the time... Ayume's figure.

LABEL: 0x51EC
STRING: Bartender

LABEL: 0x51FE
STRING: The meaning of the cocktail is... hmm, a long goodbye... Are you thinking of someone far away?

LABEL: 0x5266
STRING: A long goodbye... Is she thinking of someone far away?

LABEL: 0x52A6
STRING: I can't believe her favorite cocktail had such a meaning.

LABEL: 0x5300
STRING: Is she remembering some sort of painful past with her cocktails?

LABEL: 0x53DA
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x53EA
STRING: ...So, boy. Is your daily routine to come to the Planet's Moon after work?

LIST.STRING: I came to see you, Ayume.

LABEL: 0x54F3
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x5503
STRING: You must be having a hard time there. You come here so often...well, I can't speak for others, can I?

LABEL: 0x55C0
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x55D0
STRING: Drinking is good, isn't it? It helps you forget what you don't want to remember.

LABEL: 0x567F
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x568F
STRING: Oh? You're good. But that won't get past a grown woman like me.

LABEL: 0x56F6
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x5706
STRING: But I'd be happy if that's true. If you don't mind, you can be frank with me like that in the future.

LABEL: 0x57F9
STRING: Suddenly, Ayume, who was previously all happy, became silent.

LABEL: 0x585B
STRING: I wonder what she's thinking?

LABEL: 0x589D
STRING: I don't know if it's okay to ask, but since I have the opportunity...

LABEL: 0x58F6
STRING: Since we're here together, wouldn't it be fine to ask her?

LIST.STRING: Why do you look so sad?

LABEL: 0x59D8
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x59E8
STRING: I'm sorry. I got a bit distracted...

LABEL: 0x5A89
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x5A99
STRING: Are you worried about me? ...Oh, you're such an idiot. What are you doing asking about me?

LABEL: 0x5B50
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x5B60
STRING: Well, that's the kind of person you are, I guess. ...Thanks for caring.

LABEL: 0x5C0D
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x5C1D
STRING: Honestly? I got dumped. Let's call it a... broken heart. Dumb reason, right?

LABEL: 0x5D2E
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x5D3E
STRING: Oh, my. You're mad at him, too? Thanks, boy. You're really sweet.

LABEL: 0x5D99
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x5DA9
STRING: Hehe... I told you teasing a grown woman like me would get you nowhere.

LABEL: 0x5E62
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x5E72
STRING: But even if you are just trying to console me, I'm glad. I feel a little cheered up.

LABEL: 0x5F1D
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x5F2D
STRING: To be honest with you, it's my fault. I'm not worthy of him.

LABEL: 0x5FAA
STRING: Hearing Ayume talk about the guy who left her made me furious.

LABEL: 0x6008
STRING: What an idiot! He dumped such a beautiful woman... and made her say things like this.

LABEL: 0x6074
STRING: I must have looked very grumpy, since Ayume noticed.

LABEL: 0x6117
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x6127
STRING: Hey, what's wrong? Do you think him leaving me was unjustified?

LABEL: 0x61CA
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x61DA
STRING: You're not in love with me by any chance... are you?

LABEL: 0x6227
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x6237
STRING: Then don't. If you fall in love with me, you're going to have a real bad time.

LABEL: 0x62E8
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x62F8
STRING: Boy... you need to stop coming to see me. This is a warning.

LABEL: 0x6363
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x6373
STRING: This is the last time we'll meet. Promise me we'll never see each other again.

LABEL: 0x63DF
STRING: Oh no, why...!?

LABEL: 0x641B
STRING: Ayume gets out of her seat before I have a chance to say anything.

LABEL: 0x64C2
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x64D2
STRING: Goodbye, boy. ...Thank you for listening to me.

LABEL: 0x6529
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x6539
STRING: I feel encouraged. I feel like I've been able to remember some feelings I've forgotten recently. All thanks to you.

LABEL: 0x6604
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x6614
STRING: I'm going to try my best again... You should do your best too.

LABEL: 0x66A9
STRING: She left, leaving me puzzled.

LABEL: 0x66F9
STRING: 'I'm going to try my best again.'

LABEL: 0x6737
STRING: After I heard those words, I knew there's nothing I can do to hold her back.

LABEL: 0x6904
STRING: Since I got home...

LABEL: 0x6948
STRING: I lay on the floor, as if in a stupor.

LABEL: 0x6998
STRING: I just lay there. Time flew by.

LABEL: 0x69E2
STRING: Ayume's words repeated in my head.

LABEL: 0x6A44
STRING: 'Boy... you need to stop coming to see me. This is a warning.'

LABEL: 0x6AB6
STRING: 'This is the last time we'll meet. Promise me we'll never see each other again.'

LABEL: 0x6B22
STRING: Last time?

LABEL: 0x6B4C
STRING: Last time? But... why?

LABEL: 0x6B96
STRING: I went so far.

LABEL: 0x6BD6
STRING: I would have been fine with just having a drinking buddy.

LABEL: 0x6C30
STRING: With all this sense of loss and heartache, I tried to fall asleep, but...

LABEL: 0x6C92
STRING: No luck. I can't sleep today.

LABEL: 0x6D04
STRING: Ayume...

LABEL: 0x6D3A
STRING: Only I know I shed tears tonight.

LABEL: 0x6F4A
STRING: I'm a hard worker.

LABEL: 0x6F7C
STRING: I'm an ordinary person by nature. I didn't start with any notable talent.

LABEL: 0x6FE0
STRING: But that doesn't mean I'll give up on my life...

LABEL: 0x7032
STRING: I did what I wanted to do. I did what my instincts told me to do.

LABEL: 0x7096
STRING: Even if I didn't get what I expected, it still went fine.

LABEL: 0x70EE
STRING: Was it a blessing, or perhaps a curse, or a trick by fate?

LABEL: 0x713C
STRING: After all that hard work, ingenuity, and achievement, what awaited me was... glory.

LABEL: 0x71B0
STRING: I was able to acquire abilities rivaling those of a genius.

LABEL: 0x720C
STRING: So there is hope for the average and the outcast.

LABEL: 0x7270
STRING: Depending on the person, you may need to put blood and tears into your efforts.

LABEL: 0x72DA
STRING: You might need to give it your all, however horrid that is to say.

LABEL: 0x734C
STRING: Sometimes I feel I may have been blessed, but... one thing is for sure.

LABEL: 0x73CE
STRING: Opportunities only come to those who take initiative.

LABEL: 0x7428
STRING: It's not that I haven't done anything. In fact, I'm standing here right now because I've done everything.

LABEL: 0x749C
STRING: Next to... you.

LABEL: 0x74D2
STRING: This is what he said to me.

LABEL: 0x750C
STRING: He told me that putting in hard work is a talent in itself.

LABEL: 0x7566
STRING: ...He may be right. Maybe it is.

LABEL: 0x759A
STRING: If you don't give up, maybe you'll be rewarded.

LABEL: 0x7775
STRING: I walk down a familiar street after finishing up at work.

LABEL: 0x77BD
STRING: I get on the train and go two stops away from my workplace. I then get off and walk about for around 15 minutes.

LABEL: 0x7825
STRING: I then see my favorite bar, the Planet's Moon.

LABEL: 0x78CE
STRING: It's about 8:00pm.

LABEL: 0x7902
STRING: ...Okay, it's the usual time. I enter the bar and sit at my usual seat near the counter.

LABEL: 0x7968
STRING: This is my favorite seat. No one else is going to get it today.

LABEL: 0x79C2
STRING: Ayume is gone.

LABEL: 0x7A00
STRING: I waited for a while. She did not arrive at the usual time.

LABEL: 0x7A52
STRING: Will she really... not see me anymore?

LABEL: 0x7AA4
STRING: Ayume - you're the reason I come to this bar every day.

LABEL: 0x7B0C
STRING: It was all because of you. I supported you.

LABEL: 0x7B68
STRING: Why!? Ayume, Ayume...

LABEL: 0x7BBE
STRING: Now that you're gone, I...

LABEL: 0x7C4C
STRING: Bartender

LABEL: 0x7C5E
STRING: Boy. So you're sitting there today, too.

LABEL: 0x7CAE
STRING: The sudden voice startled me.

LABEL: 0x7CE8
STRING: The rather serious-sounding bartender called out to me.

LABEL: 0x7D31
STRING: Bartender

LABEL: 0x7D43
STRING: Are you waiting for her?

LABEL: 0x7D7E
STRING: Bartender

LABEL: 0x7D90
STRING: If so... you can go home today. She's not coming.

LABEL: 0x7DEA
STRING: No...

LABEL: 0x7E16
STRING: Why would the bartender say that...

LABEL: 0x7E53
STRING: Bartender

LABEL: 0x7E65

LABEL: 0x7F90

STRING: Bartender

LABEL: 0x7FF7

LABEL: 0x8080
STRING: The bartender held out a glass to me.

LABEL: 0x80DE

LABEL: 0x812A
STRING: I downed the glass in one gulp and waited for Ayume.

LABEL: 0x82E3

LABEL: 0x8385

LABEL: 0x83E9
STRING: I'm sure I'll see her at the Planet's Moon again once I've forgotten about her. I'm sure she'll show up again, just as she did in the past.

STRING: I lay on my bed, thinking about the past.

LABEL: 0x856D
STRING: I don't remember those days clearly, but...

LABEL: 0x85BD

LABEL: 0x861D

STRING: I saw Ayume for the first time in a drama being broadcast.

LABEL: 0x8721

LABEL: 0x87C1
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x87D1
STRING: Don't kill yourself. It won't work, anyway.

LABEL: 0x886C
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x887C

LABEL: 0x8925
STRING: Ayume

STRING: It would not be a waste to not consume everything you can before you die?

LABEL: 0x89E8
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x89F8
STRING: Because if you die, everything you have will be taken away by some stranger you'll never know.

LABEL: 0x8AC7
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x8AD7
STRING: If you will die, debts won't go away. If you will run away, debts will still follow you.

LABEL: 0x8B9C
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x8BAC
STRING: So, just live a little longer. Get away from the pain, and enjoy life while you can. Just relax.

LABEL: 0x8C2D
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x8C3D
STRING: You've been working hard for so long, haven't you? So why don't you take a little break?

LABEL: 0x8CF6
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x8D06
STRING: It's fine. Noone will blame you. In fact, I forgive you.

LABEL: 0x8DAF
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x8DBF
STRING: People are born to work until they die, even if they don't accept it.

LABEL: 0x8E78
STRING: Ayume

STRING: If you blame talent when things don't work out, then that's it.

LABEL: 0x8F2B
STRING: Ayume

STRING: It should be within our grasp too. It shouldn't be impossible to be on par with the talented.

LABEL: 0x8FEE
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x8FFE
STRING: Those who don't take action... never get a chance.

LABEL: 0x90A3
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x90B3
STRING: Is this what you want to do? Have you done what you wanted to do? Did you become what you want to be?

STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x91ED
STRING: Ayume

STRING: But you're not done yet. There's still more for you to do before you die.

LABEL: 0x928A
STRING: I never forgot this one scene.

LABEL: 0x92D6
STRING: I felt as if the words... the kindness... were directed straight at me.

LABEL: 0x933C

LABEL: 0x938A

LABEL: 0x93EA
STRING: She saved me from my hard life. She is my savior.

STRING: This is why I was so surprised when she appeared in front of me.

STRING: Silence is the only sound around.

LABEL: 0x96E8
STRING: No one is there. No one is coming.

LABEL: 0x9727
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x9737
STRING: It's quite late... Can you forgive me?

STRING: I'm trying to move on from you.

LABEL: 0x97F0
STRING: I am trying to erase you from my memory and move forward.

LABEL: 0x984A
STRING: I will never look into my past again.

LABEL: 0x988E

LABEL: 0x98DA
STRING: I'm not being proud. You denied me.

LABEL: 0x9936
STRING: I am beautiful. I lived a good life.

LABEL: 0x9D91

STRING: Ayume

STRING: Ayume

STRING: I don't have 'talent'...?

STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0xFE3A
STRING: I want to be like that person... the one I saw on TV...

LABEL: 0xFEB6
STRING: The figure of a young actor sparkled in her eyes.

LABEL: 0xFF16
STRING: Yes, she was the one she admired.

LABEL: 0xFF62
STRING: She hoped she would one day catch up and stand on the same stage. It's a girl's humble dream.

LABEL: 0xFFC1
STRING: Ayume

STRING: If I have no talent, won't they send me away?

LABEL: 0x1002C
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1003C
STRING: If I was a God... I could be like that without trying.

LABEL: 0x100BC
STRING: She had no special abilities or personality.

LABEL: 0x10106
STRING: Was it because she lived a very common life?

LABEL: 0x10178
STRING: A turning point arrives, as she is tormented by her lack of individuality.

LABEL: 0x101D6
STRING: An event which triggers her dormant talent...

LABEL: 0x1022A
STRING: One day.

LABEL: 0x10262
STRING: It was the usual after school activity. Her friends invited her out, but she made a detour back home.

LABEL: 0x102CA
STRING: She then got lost, the area became dark, and then she became impatient.

LABEL: 0x10324
STRING: By the time she got home, it was already past 8 PM.

LABEL: 0x10382
STRING: The door was unlocked.

LABEL: 0x103BA
STRING: She took off her shoes and proceeded into the house.

LABEL: 0x103F3
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x10403
STRING: I'm back! Sorry I'm late...

LABEL: 0x10455
STRING: The house was oddly silent. It made her uncomfortable.

LABEL: 0x104A3
STRING: The door to the living room was half-open. Light from it shone into the hallway.

LABEL: 0x10506
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x10516
STRING: ...Dad? Mom? Are you there?

STRING: The girl peered inside.

LABEL: 0x105FB
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x107C6
STRING: At that moment, something in the girl snapped.

LABEL: 0x1087A
STRING: Her father, mother, brother, and sister are all here.

LABEL: 0x108D4
STRING: None of them resemble who they used to be, but she knew.

LABEL: 0x10936

LABEL: 0x10988
STRING: The scene was so unrealistic that, weirdly enough, she didn't cry.

LABEL: 0x109E0
STRING: She hated yourself for being so perceptive, even though she was a child.
